data.eml:eml: Ctenocheloides attenboroughi n. gen., n. sp. (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea: Ctenochelidae), a new ghost shrimp with pectinate claw fingers from Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arthur Anker (2010): Ctenocheloides attenboroughi n. gen., n. sp. (Crustacea: Decapoda: Axiidea: Ctenochelidae), a new ghost shrimp with pectinate claw fingers from Madagascar. Journal of Natural History 44 (29): 1789-1805, DOI: 10.1080/00222931003633219
